text: Kristina Orbakaitе (, , born 25 May 1971), is a Russian singer and actress. She is the daughter of Russian pop star Alla Pugacheva and Lithuanian circus performer Mykolas Orbakas. ==Albums== * 1994 – Верность "Fidelity" * 1996 – Ноль Часов, Ноль Минут "Zero Hours, Zero Minutes" * 1998 – Ты "You" * 1999 – Той Женщине, Которая... "To That Woman, Who.." * 2000 – Май "May" * 2001 – The Best * 2001 – Remixes * 2002 – Верь В Чудеса "Believe in Miracles" * 2002 – Океан Любви "Ocean of Love" * 2003 – Перелётная Птица "Wandering Bird" * 2005 – My Life * 2008 – Слышишь.. это я "Listen...it's me" * 2009 – The Best Part 1 and Part 2 * 2011 – Поцелуй на бис "Encore Kiss" * 2013 – Маски "Masks" ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Website of Kristina Orbakaite Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Moscow Category:Musicians from Moscow Category:Singers from Moscow Category:Russian movie actors
title: Kristina Orbakaitė
